concise_definition: n. 戒指, 圆环, 铃声, 拳击台; v. 环绕, 按铃, 发出铃声

definitions.explanation_en: A circular band, typically made of metal, worn on the finger as a symbol of marriage, status, or ornamentation.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一种通常由金属制成的环形物品，戴在手指上，用作婚姻、身份或装饰的象征。
definitions.example_en: She wore a gold wedding ring on her left hand.
definitions.example_cn: 她左手戴着一枚金婚戒。

definitions.explanation_en: A circular shape or area, such as a ring of trees, a ring of smoke, or the circular boundary of a sports arena.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一种圆形的形状或区域，如树木组成的圆环、烟圈，或体育场馆的圆形边界。
definitions.example_en: The firefighters formed a ring around the burning building to contain the fire.
definitions.example_cn: 消防员们围绕着着火的大楼形成一道环形防线以控制火势。

definitions.explanation_en: The sound produced by a bell or telephone when it alerts someone; also refers to the act of calling someone by ringing a bell or phone.
definitions.explanation_cn: 铃或电话发出的提醒声音；也指通过按铃或打电话来呼叫某人的行为。
definitions.example_en: I heard the doorbell rings three times but no one answered.
definitions.example_cn: 我听到门铃响了三次，但没人应答。

definitions.explanation_en: A professional boxing or wrestling arena, typically square or circular with ropes surrounding the fighting area.
definitions.explanation_cn: 职业拳击或摔跤比赛的场地，通常为方形或圆形，四周由绳索围成。
definitions.example_en: The champion stepped into the ring to defend his title.
definitions.example_cn: 冠军步入拳台，捍卫他的头衔。

definitions.explanation_en: To make a ringing sound, especially from a bell, phone, or alarm.
definitions.explanation_cn: 发出铃声，尤指来自铃、电话或警报器的声音。
definitions.example_en: The phone rang just as I was leaving the house.
definitions.example_cn: 我正要出门时，电话响了。

definitions.explanation_en: To surround or encircle something completely.
definitions.example_en: The castle was rings by a wide moat.
definitions.example_cn: 城堡被一条宽阔的护城河环绕着。

comparison.analysis: “Circle” (圆) 是一个纯粹的几何形状，强调数学或视觉上的圆形轮廓，不带有功能或象征意义。而 “ring” 不仅指形状，还常指具有特定用途或文化含义的环状物，如戒指、拳击台或铃声。
“Band” (带、环) 通常指较宽或扁平的环形物，如发带、乐队或橡胶带，材质和用途更广泛，不一定封闭或坚硬。而 “ring” 通常指坚硬、封闭、圆形的物体，尤其用于指首饰或声音。
“Bell” (铃) 是发出声音的物体本身，而 “ring” 作为动词时指铃发出的声音或动作。两者相关，但 “ring” 是动作或结果，而 “bell” 是工具。例如：The bell rings（铃响了），而非 The ring rings。
